google_play_reviews.content: Thank you! Thank you for creating a simple and effective app like this. All we need is pin ours reminders on the notification bar and you guys did it!!!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your support

google_play_reviews.content: When I swipe down, my notes are no where to be found. If I come here and press open, I can see my note. Once I'm out of the Play Store, it's nowhere to be found. It only held one small note. I've no idea what good this app even is!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We have not had this issue reported to us before, and we'd certainly like to work this through for you. Could you share the details at penguenlabs@gmail.com? And any relevant screenshots would be immensely valuable. Thank you.

google_play_reviews.content: Super useful to take quick notes in quick succession. I use it every day to keep track of things I need to get it later in the day or to collect ideas and review them in the evening. Pinning notes doesn't work for me (Android 14) and sometimes I miss notes. The history list allows me to restore them, but that's often too late.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it. Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

google_play_reviews.content: It doesn't work on my Android 13.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Could you please be a little more specific about what is not working? Please contact us at penguenlabs@gmail.com.

google_play_reviews.content: Sorry- makes absolutely no sense.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi, could you please tell us why do you dislike our app? If you have any suggestions, please send them to penguenlabs@gmail.com.

google_play_reviews.content: I love the simplicity of the app. But I think it'd strongly benefit from the following features: - possibility to edit a pinned note from the notification menu (fx as a third button besides "copy" and "unpin") - option to have the app close automatically after pushing a note (cause I almost always write only one push note at a time, and would love for it to take as few steps as possible) Cheers!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Dear User, really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the new version.

google_play_reviews.content: This is a great reminder tool, absolutely my fav. I'm a writer and use this for when I get an idea I don't want to forget. It's quick, it's fast, it stares me in the face until I do something, perfect! Thanks for all the tweaks you have thus far made. Do you think you could possibly add an option to consolidate the icons in the status bar? So one may opt for a single icon to represent several notes instead of an icon for each note? For ex, 3 notes can display 1 icon in status bar or 3?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for taking out time to rate us. It really helps us to keep going and delivering the best :).

google_play_reviews.content: Notifications are automatically removed from the screen again and again. .... Sir can't come on screen recording because after lock screen it goes away after some time
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Could you please mark "Pinned note" option on the main screen? This option will make your note sticky on notification bar, it won't go until you press "Unpin" button. Did this suggestion fix your problem?
